question: Do I need a Federal Employer Identification Number (EIN)?
answer:
Sole Proprietorship who do not have employees usually do not need to apply for a Federal Employer Identification Number (EIN); however, corporate entities (LLC, Corporation, etc.)Â must apply for this registration whether they have employees or not.
For more information, visit: https://www.irs.gov/businesses/small-businesses-self-employed/employer-id-numbers
